TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit RemoteArgument extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示一个类型的实例，可跨进程和应用程序域边界传递该实例。

span.span: Represents an instance of a type that can be passed across process and application domain boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 结构可传递在跨进程和应用程序域边界之前未确定的类型的参数。Use the structure to pass arguments of types that are not determined until run time across process and application domain boundaries. 的用途 类似于 `VARIANT` COM 中的类型。The purpose of is similar to that of the `VARIANT` type in COM. 你可以使用 将以下类型和值作为远程参数传递：You can use to pass the following types and values as remote arguments: - .. - .. - 内部数据类型。Intrinsic data types. - 包含内部数据类型的元素的数组。Arrays that contain elements of intrinsic data types. 内部数据类型是一种基元数据类型 (也就是说，类型的 属性是 `true`) 或 、 、 或 。An intrinsic data type is a primitive data type (that is, the property of the type is `true`) or a , , , or . 提供它支持的每个类型的构造函数。 provides constructors for each of the types that it supports. 你还可以使用 方法创建 对象。You can also use the methods to create objects. 方法自动 为参数类型调用适当的构造函数。The methods automatically call the appropriate constructor for your argument type. 如果 使用默认的无参数构造函数创建，则 属性将设置为值 ，并且 属性将设置为值 。If you create a using the default parameterless constructor, the property is set to the value and the property is set to the value .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
